name: Hacienda Venecia
description: Relaxed rooms & dorms in a hotel on a coffee plantation, offering 2 outdoor pools & a garden.
amenities: This relaxed hotel on a coffee plantation comprises a main building, a lodge and hostel annexes. It's 3 km from Route 50 and 15 km from Bolivar Plaza in Manizales. Basic hostel dorms with shared bathrooms have bunk beds and sleep 4 or 8 people. Casual lodge and main house rooms have balconies, and most provide en suite bathrooms. Breakfast is complimentary for lodge and main house guests. The hostel has a garden with a bamboo gazebo and hammocks, plus a shared kitchen. The lodge offers a veranda, an outdoor pool and a lounge/dining room, while the main house also has an outdoor pool. Activities include plantation tours and hiking.
